meanings.definition: A person who is lacking in intelligence or common sense.
meanings.sent1: The group of halfwits struggled to solve the simple puzzle.
meanings.sent2: Don't listen to those halfwits; they don't know what they're talking about.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show featured a hilarious skit with a bunch of halfwits trying to cook a meal.
meanings.sent4: In the land of the blind, the one-eyed man is king - a halfwit among geniuses.
meanings.sent5: The image of the bumbling halfwits tripping over each other stuck in my mind.
